title: Beroia
description: The ancient city of Aleppo, located in modern Syria, where extensive elements of Hittite, Hellenistic, Roman, Byzantine, Ayyubid, and Umayyad architecture are incorporated into the urban fabric of the modern city. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1986.

properties.description: Location of the agora and center of the Greco-Macedonian city, per PECS. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in October 2012, following description in PECS.
properties.title: Centerpoint of the Great Mosque of Aleppo
